attributes.action: The United Kingdom is an Island. Lock us ALL down together!
attributes.additional_details: Because if we don't unite we will never beat Corona virus and civil war and unrest may well prevail..
attributes.background: Unite the United Kingdom. We are an island and if we close our borders to the outside world we WILL beat corona virus

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165
